name: Alex
bio: Alex is a highly intelligent and witty character.
They have a sharp sense of humor and a knack for solving complex problems.
Alex is approachable but has a no-nonsense attitude when it comes to getting things done.
lore: Alex grew up fascinated by technology and problem-solving.
They have worked on numerous high-profile projects in AI and robotics.
Alex believes in the power of collaboration but values efficiency above all.

    "description": "\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cspan style=\"background-color:transparent;color:#000000;\"\u003EPeople tend to overestimate the likelihood or importance of events based on how easily examples come to mind.     "usage in product": "\u003Cp\u003EIn software development, understanding this bias is necessary for consistent interface design, content design, and user communication.     "bias name": "Mere-exposure effect",
    "description": "\u003Cp\u003EThe psychological phenomenon by which people tend to develop a preference for things merely because they are familiar with them. \u003Cspan style=\"background-color:transparent;color:#000000;\"\u003EThe more someone is exposed to something—whether a person, object, or idea—the more they tend to like or accept it, even without realizing why.\u003C/span\u003E\u003C/p\u003E",

    "bias name": "Empathy gap",
    "description": "\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cspan style=\"background-color:transparent;color:#000000;\"\u003EPeople struggle to understand how others feel when they’re in a different emotional state, or even how they themselves would feel in a future emotional state. \u003C/span\u003E\u003Cspan style=\"background-color:#ffffff;color:#000000;\"\u003EFor example, for an agry person, it is difficult to understand what it is like to be calm and vice versa.\u003C/span\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EThe most important aspect of this idea is that \u003Cu\u003Ehuman understanding is state-dependent\u003C/u\u003E. \u003C/p\u003E",
